SageTVPlugin.Name: Restart Sage from Setup Menu
SageTVPlugin.Description: Adds an option to the Setup menu to restart the SageTV server.
SageTVPlugin.Author: skiingwiz
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
If this is run on an installation that does not run SageTV as a service, it will restart the local instance.
1.0 - Initial Release for STV7
